TopicTitle: [0.21][Parts Pack]Deep Space Mission Pack - Now open source!

Articles.Content: Got my plugin?
With 0.16 coming, the Centrifuges should be able to carry crew, don\'t you think?

I dont know if anyone mentioned this. But your parts are the EXACT ones from the movie Mission to Mars. I just watched it and im like. Wait... That looks exactly like the one from Deep Space Mission Pack o_o
so the engine and battery type parts are working for me they just say that they are not available in the version of ksp? what do i do

Do you have my plugin?

The solar panel needs a new part.cfg now, I\'ll make one later.

Edit:

Here it is.

Still not outdated.
Time to update, methinks....

Time to update, methinks....

Time to be an ass, methinks....

I\'d love to see this pack updated, but acting like it\'s your god-given right to get updates to a mod to an alpha game isn\'t the way to go about it. This guy only gets the fun of the challenge, the joy of having parts he wants, and the praise of grateful users as his reward for updating this pack.

So try to show some respect, and ask politely, or just don\'t ask at all, instead of acting like a spoiled brat.

/rant

I do hope that kockaspiton updates the pack to make use of some of the cool new features, crew capacities and animations would rock.
Now that 1.6 is out and I see what is what I\'m definitely going to do an update.

Now that 1.6 is out and I see what is what I\'m definitely going to do an update.

Yaaaaaay! Awesome! I\'ve been waiting for it for a long time!
were this plugin?

In my dropbox! ;P

Okay,

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=11402.0
okay i have gotten everything else to work but the solar panels does that have something to do with the .DS_Store file

The ds_store is something like thumbs.db but for crapintosh, it doeswn\'t affect the mod.

You need a different .cfg file, look back some pages, it\'s somewhere attached to one of my posts.
well luckily for me i don\'t use crapintosh, but i still need to figure out why the solar panel is still say that it is not available.

Now that 1.6 is out and I see what is what I\'m definitely going to do an update.

Awesome
Just for the record it\'s not crapintosh, but a hackintosh. Equivalent with a 2500$ machine but from much cheaper pc parts.
so what your saying is an overpriced computer. since for that kind of money i could make a pc that is better and get what i want out of it.
I dont know if it\'s something i did or not, but the solar panels were 'not available in your version of KSP', but the ion engine and battery were. Does anybody know what i may have done wrong?

so what your saying is an overpriced computer. since for that kind of money i could make a pc that is better and get what i want out of it.

OFF:

Nope, what I\'m saying is that I have a Mac OSX running on a standard PC. That way I benefit from the superior os, but without any additional cost.

ON:

About the solar panels, I\'ll look into it in the next version, this whole independent plugin thing seems to confuse people, maybe I\'ll just write my own.

The solar panels had to be replaced and don\'t work anymore with the old config file.

I\'d suggest that you include the plugin in the .zip file, from .16 on, old versions should still work for a time, and it whould be less confusing. Also try to update the .zip file if I release a new plugin, to not confuse the users (I can PM you before I release a new version).

so i take it that you 2 worked on some of the mods for the game?

and i wont say the osx is bad i used to us a mac back in os9, but dont u get driver issues or r u runner a mirror of windows aswell
